article_text:
Double Take 'Toons: If You Like It?

President Obama apologized on Thursday for erroneously assuring Americans that "if you like your plan, you can keep it." David Fitzsimmons thinks Affordable Care Act opponents have no right to call someone else a "liar," while Eric Allie thinks Obama's about-face was a cheap move.

i toggle caption David Fitzsimmons David Fitzsimmons
